A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of plot holes.  Doesn't honor Star Wars canon.  Don't like how Luke was portrayed.  Finn and Rose end up being worthless characters.  Rey's background is a huge disappointment.  What Luke does in the end he should have done in person and it would have had more meaning..  Superman Leia is a stretch.  The first order chasing the rebels for more than half the movie was lazy writing.  The movie is full of political correctness with the portrayal of income inequality\, females are stronger\, smarter and more endearing than the dumb men.  I liked the Yoda cameo except where Yoda burns down the Jedi temple tree which is like Disney's way of flipping the bird to old cannon and making way of Disney's way of doing things.  I liked all of Chewbacca's scenes and the Millenium Falcon is awesome as usual.
